items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars True to size and very comfortable
items.body: Fit and style are great. Comfortable but classy. A bit sheer but an slip or spanx were easy fix Read more
items.author: Cate

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Obsessedddddddd
items.body: I am in love with this dress! I’m going to buy every color! It’s the perfect dreamy effortless dress. I love wearing it around the house and out and about. I feel like a romantic novel heroine or Victorian ghost floating around the house in this. Whether I’m running errands, cooking, reading or just rotting on the couch watching tv I feel put together and feminine. It has a very old world Victorian/regency charm to the design in my opinion. Perfect for those who love historic fashion but still want something practical. The neckline is a perfect v, low enough to feel a little flirty but not plunging. It may not fit as nicely on more busty women though. Perfect for us itty bitty ladies. The sleeves are a little bit long and the ruffle covers half my hand but I love it, it adds to that vintage feminine historical charm. The skirt is very full and is the perfect length. Just barely hovers above the floor (I’m 5’3 and ordered a size small) it is very flattering and shows your curves at the right angles and hides them in others giving a mysterious feminine allure. My husband loves it. Very versatile and would be maternity friendly. The color is very close to the picture, a very pretty Victorian rose pink. Read more
items.author: Mianette

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty but wrong size bust
items.body: It’s really pretty! It’s light and flowy which I love m. The only problem, like all the other reviews say, is that it’s for women with small breasts. I am 38 B and I got a size medium, but I think size large or maybe extra large would fit better on me. It fit fine around the bust when I first put it on, but after moving around a little bit it just looked a little funny. Super pretty though! The other thing that I wasn’t expecting was that there were stripes on the dress. Looking back, I can see it in the photos but I didn’t notice it beforehand. Read more
items.author: Whit Bit

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Turn it Around!
items.body: A couple positives about this dress. It is very soft. I'm not sure what I was expecting. So often these purchases are hit or miss. This one, however, had a softness and was, to me, a beautiful fabric. I received the Mauve/Dusty Rose shade and I love it. I am a bigger girl and very leary of the brands that only go up to a XL or, sometimes even a XXL. Again, it is typical with these purchases for the need to be sizing up. I am 5' 3.5" tall/269lbs./ Big Breasts, Small Waist/ Larger Hips & Thighs. I don't know what possessed me to order this as it only goes to an XL. I am glad I took the chance though. It is generously sized below the waist and fit my larger lower half beautifully. It does not cling and flows softly with a perfect BoHo feel. BUT, if you are a larger breasted woman, as I am, you will find this dress does not fit well in that area. I am a 38G - it wasn't happening. Given this you have 2 choices. 1. Wear it as it is meant to be. This will leave a bit of a shapeless silhouette. The elastic/ruching will end up a bit above your breasts - a bit like more towards your shoulders. It doesn't look awful if your are ok missing out on the Empire style that gives it some definition. OR 2. Turn this dress around & wear it backwards! That's my choice. There are no tags in the dress so there is nothing to either irritate your skin or struggle to cut out. This worked well for me. The neck comes a little high but not in an uncomfortable way. It just won't give a peek of decolletage. It gives more of a waist level definition from the front as opposed to Empire. But, what I found I loved was the sexy little V it gave in back. So many times a V back is way too low for me because it shows my bra but this was perfect. If you are on the fence about, give it a try. I'd say 8 out of 10 you will find a way to wear that is comfortable for you. Read more
items.author: SuzMSen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Boho Chic
items.body: It’s a beautiful dress and I love the color blue I chose. It’s like a light denim shade. The length was perfect (5’4” size L) hit top of feet and the elastic cuffs are not tight so very comfortable. I have the same issue as other reviews stated that the chest area doesn’t stay in place. I like it better down where it’s supposed to be but if you have this issue it doesn’t look bad letting it be up above your chest as more decorative ruching under the collar bone. It will stop you from going crazy constantly pulling it down. Someone had a great idea of pinning it in place and I’m going to try this. Material is very nice and this color is not see-thru. I definitely recommend and will be buying another color. If you’re under 5’4 it may be a little long unless you’re wearing heels. Read more
items.author: BSoldFL

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars All around dress
items.body: This dress looks very good on me. It is not too sheer, with the right amount of thickness and versatility that you can wear year round. It has o stretch and the seams are good quality with no loose threads. I love it. Want to try in other colors. Read more
items.author: Kathy Shelton

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars The color is great. Quality fabric
items.author: Spirit

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Mid quality, love the style
items.body: The dress is pretty, bought to wear for baby shower and maternity photos. The material is cheaper than expected and it doesn't reach the floor for me (I'm around 5'7"-8"ish). I'm wearing a medium in the photo, and with the medium the top part fit weird on me. I returned the medium and sized up to a large and it's much better (still doesn't reach the floor though). It's all one layer, it doesn't have any lining or anything under it. It's definitely overpriced for the quality but I really like the style of the dress and will wear it as planned. Also, all the wrinkles smoothed out after washing/drying the dress. Read more
items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Maxi V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Maxi V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Darkpink, Rust Brown, Blue, Burgundy, Sage Green, Black, Darkrose, Ginger, Lightpink, Haze Blue, Tender Green, Beige, Purple, Darkblue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
